title: Pixel font for knitting patterns
content:
Hello Everybody,

I am designing knitting patterns for a book for my MA priject and need a bitmap/pixel font that will fit perfectly into a square grid I have created for the designs (there are 60). I am using Crypt but this does not fit perfectly on the grid and i am going to have to create outlines and individually tweek it all which will take a long time. it needs to look perfect as this is about the pattern designs aesthetics rather the functionality of the piece.

Please please help. my deadline is looming and I would be eternally grateful!!

iz
